title: Marx for beginners (TEFC)
creator_credit: Bob Godfrey, Cucumber Studios and Contemporary Films
brief_description: Bob Godfrey and his collaborators, Clive Morton and Kevin Attew, have created a distillation of the works of Marx. Its intention is to make Marx more accessible and attractive to a wide range of people through its humorous graphic style.
